mapper.select: SELECT a.object_code AS "originObjectCode", b.synonym_object_code AS "synonymObjectCode", b.synonym_type AS "synonymType", b.synonym_display_name AS "synonymDisplayName" FROM t_dic_word a, t_dic_synonym b WHERE a.object_id = b.object_id AND a.system_code = b.system_code AND a.version = b.version AND a.system_code = #{systemCode} AND a.version = #{version}
